content.text: I'm a male and I'm divorced. I have a few kids and I love to build things with my hands. I hate being still. What about you?
I'm a female and I'm single. I went into the army after high school and I like to sing karoke. My mother was not part of my life and I am allergic to dogs. I am also colorblind.

Wow, you're quite the interesting person! I'm not allergic to dogs, but I don't like them very much. I can't imagine what it was like to grow up without a mother. Do you ever feel like you missed out on something?
Sometimes, but I've learned to live with it. I have a lot of other people in my life who love and support me.
That's good to hear. I'm glad you have a good support system.
Me too. So, what do you like to build with your hands?
I like to build all sorts of things, from furniture to toys. I'm always coming up with new projects.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I wish I was more creative.
You could be! Everyone has the potential to be creative. It just takes practice.
I'll have to give it a try sometime.
I think you'd be great at it.
